targets.Name: Racerbear
postText: You found it! Racerbear did not buckle their helmet before they started riding.
It is important to buckle our helmets, just like we need to buckle our seatbelts in the car.
targets.hint: I'm soft but shed all over
Text: FURRY PET (Ex: Dogs, Cats, Hamsters, Guinea Pigs, and Rabbits) are common pet allergens that can trigger asthma symptoms in some people.Pet hair and dander, especially cat hair, can fly in the air and land on surfaces throughout the house...

targets.Name: Skaterbear
postText: Good find! Skaterbear is wearing safety pads.
When learning how to ride a bike or skate for the first time, safety pads are a great way to protect yourself in case something goes wrong.
